title: How you can tell when danger is on the horizon in a prison1
description: Jason Wilke retired from the Department of Corrections three weeks ago after a 20-year career with DOC, 15 as a gang investigator within the state's prisons. He's a state trainer and travels the country teaching others about gang trends and intervention
itunes:author: Circle Of Insight Productions
